uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.swing

Class JFormDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.swing.JFormDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, Contexed

    public class JFormDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements Contexed
    JFormDialog is a modal dialog window for editing the contents of a Form. This class also implements any FormActions defined for the Form though the state of the Form used to initialise this object will also be modified.
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
